title: CIA Documents - Gooner
description:
This is a collection of various CIA related manuals, handbooks, and documents I have collected over the years. Makes for interesting reading. I stumbled across it while pulling out E-books for my Weird -E-Books uploads collections here at IPT and figured I would just upload it to see if anyone might be interested.

CONTENTS:

1. Pyschological Operations Techniques & Procedures (Field Manual 33-1-1)

2. Tactics In Counterinsurgency (FMI 3-24.2)

3. UN Draft Portrait of Iraq

4. Senate Hearing On MKULTRA

5. MKULTRA Unclassified Documents

6. Project MKULTRA: CIA's Research On Behavioral Modification

7. NSA (National Security Agency) Employee Handbook

8. Political Warfare & Psychological Operations

9. Psychological Operations: The Ethical Dimension

10. From PSYOP To Mind War 

11. Operations In Low Intensity Conflict (FM 7-98)

12. Tactical Psychological Operations (FM 3-05-302)

13. Psychological Operations (FM 3-05-301)

14. Counterinsurgency (FM 3-24)

15. CIA: A Study Of Assassination

16. CIA: Pysocological Operations In Guerrilla Warfare

17. CIA Manual: Psychology In Guerrilla Warfare

18. CIA: The Secret Team How They Control The World

19. CIA Project Superman: Montauk Experiments

20. CIA MKULTRA Materials & Methods

21. CIA Analysis Training Handbook

22. Strategic Communications Report 2004

23. Dept. Of Defense Information Operations Roadmap

24. US Army Civil Disturbance Operations

25. US Army Counter Guerrilla Operations (FM 90-8)

26. Studies In Intelligence

27. CIA Deep Cover

28. CIA Deception Research Program #9   

PLEASE NOTE! I AM NOT RELEASING NATIONAL SECURITY SECRETS. ALL INFORMATION CONTAINED HERE IS FREELY AVAILABLE IF ONE KNOWS WHERE TO LOOK. ALL DOCUMENTS HAVE BEEN RELEASED INTO THE PUBLIC ARENA. HOWEVER THE PUBLIC IS NOT ENCOURAGED TO BE MADE AWARE THEY EXIST, LET ALONE READ THEM. ALL I HAVE DONE IS ASSEMBLE THEM INTO ONE PACKAGE. AN INFORMED CITIZEN IS A GOOD CITIZEN.
